DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze whether Dabrafenib +/- Trametinib are effective in overall survival, response rates and toxicity in both programs.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Analysis of Dabrafenib +/- Trametinib Compassionate Use Experience in Spain
DOC.criteria: Patients who have received at least one dose of dabrafenib or combination with trametinib as part of a compassionate use for the treatment of metastatic melanoma, with deadline the start of treatment the April 30, 2014. Patients with a history not available.
